text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Faster――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Stronger――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: To run one step farther!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Follow me, Cesario!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(――!! Just stay close! No matter how unsightly 
it looks, just chase after her, and keep up!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haa……Kuu……Haaa……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Good job……keeping up. 
Trainer, it's a superb regimen. Everything is on track.

Yeah. Symboli Kris S, thanks for cooperating. 
It's thanks to you.

Yeah. Symboli Kris S, thanks for cooperating. 
It's thanks to you.

That encounter――was purely coincidence. 
Almost like it was fated to release Cesario from her own shackles.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
――I'm Symboli Kris S. 
……I came to pray. You are――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Symboli Kris S. Despite being in the Classic class, 
won the 『Tenno Sho (Fall)』. The following year, she 
became the first Uma Musume to win it consecutively)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(It's the first time we've met…… But why……does it 
feel like this isn't the first time? Why is that……?)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm……that look…… 
Are you worried about something?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
W-well……yes…… 
About my running, just a little……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
About your running, huh? 
Then――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I can at least listen. 
I'm not――a god though.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I see, a new strength……is it? 
You're right.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Ever since coming to this country, I've changed. 
Encounters――bring about evolution.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: They gave me――the strength to win the 『Tenno Sho (Fall)』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Kris S-san, um……I have a request! 
I know it's rude since we just met.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Would you mind meeting my trainer? 
Maybe, if you were to lend a hand……!

Symboli Kris S was the ideal training partner. You could 
say the power in their engines was completely different.

By having Cesario chase after her, 
it led to Cesario's running becoming more powerful.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……this……feeling…… Trainer, by running with 
Kris S-san, I can feel that my core has changed alot.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Just running in an ideal manner isn't enough. And sometimes, 
you have to destroy the ideal, and just push forward recklessly.

Yeah, I'm glad you found a good partner. 
You can aim even higher.

Yeah, I'm glad you found a good partner. 
You can aim even higher.

And so, preparations were complete 
to take on Air Messiah at the 『Oaks』
And then――the day of the 『Oaks』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Then――I'll be heading out, Trainer.

Yeah, be confident. If it's the you now, when you're 
at your best, there isn't a race you can lose!

Yeah, be confident. If it's the you now, when you're 
at your best, there isn't a race you can lose!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah. 
I'll believe in my legs――and definitely――!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ――Air Messiah-san.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Her aura really is different――today.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(The 『Oaks』…… When my mother was the closest 
to the Tiara……a race she placed 2nd in……)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(Cesario-san, I will defeat you, and earn my place! On that day, 
my mother was within reach of glory……but today, for sure!)

Many people were here to watch, 
each with their own different emotions. And so――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I can hear it…… 
The budding of a large oak.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Now, it's finally here again this year. To these young maidens, 
a harsh 2400m. A fierce competition in the spring, the 『Oaks』――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Finally starts!
